What's New at Visory

Stay up to date with our latest features, improvements, and updates

June 2023

Multiple Camera Support

We're excited to announce that Visory now supports multiple camera streams simultaneously. Connect and monitor up to 4 devices at once from a single viewing device.

Key improvements:

  • Monitor multiple rooms at once
  • Customizable grid view
  • Individual notification settings per camera
  • Improved performance for multi-camera setups
April 2023

Enhanced Motion Detection

Our latest update brings significant improvements to motion detection capabilities, reducing false alarms while ensuring you never miss important activity.

What's improved:

  • AI-powered motion analysis
  • Customizable motion sensitivity
  • Motion zones - define specific areas to monitor
  • Smart notifications with motion thumbnails
February 2023

Web App Launch

We've launched our new web application, allowing you to monitor your cameras from any browser without installing additional software.

Web app features:

  • Access your cameras from any device with a browser
  • Responsive design works on desktop and mobile
  • Secure cloud connection
  • No additional software required
Try Web App
December 2022

Night Vision Mode

Visory now includes enhanced night vision capabilities, allowing for clear video even in low-light conditions.

Night vision improvements:

  • Automatic low-light detection
  • Enhanced image processing for clearer night footage
  • Reduced noise in low-light conditions
  • Battery optimization for night mode
October 2022

Sound Detection Algorithms

Our new sound detection algorithms can identify specific sounds like baby crying, dog barking, and breaking glass.

New sound detection features:

  • Baby cry detection
  • Pet sound recognition
  • Glass break detection
  • Customizable sound sensitivity

Coming Next

Here's a sneak peek at what we're working on for future updates:

Cloud Recording

Secure cloud storage for your recordings with flexible retention options.

Face Recognition

Get alerts when specific people are detected by your cameras.

Smart Home Integration

Connect with popular smart home platforms like Google Home and Amazon Alexa.

We Value Your Feedback

Have suggestions for new features or improvements? We'd love to hear from you!
